calculate(String, double, double, double) - Method in class richardson.joshua.discount.tests.Testing
This sets up the program to be able to create its own inputs without relying on the user to enter values the items are added to the basket using methods in the EasyInitialisation class an assertion is performed to see if the expectation matches the actual value calculated
